Text: Whoever labeled this "Progressive rock" must be completely deaf.

Casey McPherson – vocals, electric guitar, keyboard
    Steve Morse – acoustic guitar, electric guitar
    Dave LaRue – bass guitar
    Neal Morse – keyboard, vocals
    Mike Portnoy – drum, percussion, vocals

Those guys are awesome!!!
Great disc so far =) thanks for the UL
Nobody is putting a gun at your head and forcing you to listen to anything, m3t4lm4n. And Portnoy is a free man, he can play with whoever he wants to.
